statements: REVOKE SELECT, INSERT, UPDATE, DELETE ON iot_devices FROM user1;
REVOKE SELECT, INSERT ON iot_devices FROM user2;
REVOKE ALL PRIVILEGES ON iot_devices FROM user3;
REVOKE SELECT ON devices FROM public
REVOKE INSERT ON data FROM public
REVOKE UPDATE(device_name) ON devices FROM public
REVOKE SELECT, INSERT, UPDATE, DELETE ON devices TO user1;
REVOKE SELECT, INSERT ON devices TO user2;
REVOKE ALL PRIVILEGES ON devices TO user3;
REVOKE SELECT ON Devices FROM public
REVOKE SELECT, INSERT ON Sensors FROM public
REVOKE SELECT, INSERT, UPDATE, DELETE ON Readings FROM public
